text: I love doing crafts and I love anything
travel and i love the holiday season so
I thought I'd combine all three of those
together and present you with DIY travel
gift ideas in this first video I'm going
to teach you how to make a chalkboard
globe
what you'll need is an Old Globe acrylic
paint clear chalkboard paint and paint
brushes you can use an old globe you
have at home or from a secondhand store
clear chalkboard paint from your local
craft store your choice of color of
acrylic paint I chose blue black and
white and various sizes of paint brushes
which you can get from a dollar store
now let's get started squeeze the paint
color you're going to use to paint over
the oceans begin painting your first
layer but be careful when you're going
around the countries when you're done
your globe will look like this so you
want to do another layer of paint next
take the color paint you're going to use
to color over the countries begin
painting the countries and make sure to
be careful around the edges so the
continents don't lose their shape you
can do two coats if necessary once
you've painted your globe and the two
colors you've chosen you're going to
want to outline the continents with
white that way it gives it more of a pop
again you can use any color you wish
begin to outline the continents and
Islands like so using a thin paint brush
take your time to make sure the lines
aren't too thick once you're done and
your globe is completely dry it's time
to put on the clear chalkboard paint be
sure to shake it well so it's evenly
blended pour some of the paint into a
container and using a larger paintbrush
begin painting the globe with vertical
strokes leave it to dry for an hour
before putting on a second coat only
this time painting with horizontal
strokes when you're done leave it to dry
for 24 hours before applying the chalk
and there you have it your very own
chalkboard globe I'm going to use this a
plan on my future trip so I can mark
down which countries i'll be visiting
and the route that i'm going to take to
get there
